name: Intimate Relationships / Close Relationships / Partnership
description: Describe how you want to be in an intimate relationship. Write what type of relationship you desire, and focus on your role in that relationship.

name: Family Relationships
description: Describe how you want to be as a sibling, parent, or child. Outline the qualities you wish these relationships to have and how you would treat others if you were your ideal self.

name: Friends / Social Life
description: Explain what it means to be a good friend. If you could be the perfect friend, how would you behave? Describe an ideal friendship and social life.

name: Work
description: Describe the type of work you want to doâ€”be it specific or general. Explain why this ideal job appeals to you and what kind of coworker you wish to be.

name: Education and Personal Development
description: What do you want to learn? Describe the form of education or personal development that appeals to you, whether formal or informal.

name: Leisure Activities
description: Describe the lifestyle you want during your free time. Include your hobbies, sports, and other leisure interests to create a well-rounded picture.

name: Spirituality and Harmony
description: Whether or not you follow an organized religion, explain what spirituality means to you. Describe how you would like to experience a sense of harmony and connection.

name: Community Engagement
description: If community involvement is important to you, describe how you wish to contribute or participate. Outline what aspects of social engagement appeal to you.

name: Self-Care
description: Focus on your health and well-being. Explain your priorities regarding physical health, including sleep, exercise, diet, and overall self-care.

name: Parenting
description: If you are or plan to be a parent, describe what is important for you in this role. Outline the kind of relationship you desire with your children and what qualities you wish to embody.
